test.introduction: To navigate between quiz questions, click through the links to the right or use the buttons below each question. Check your answers as you go using the 'Check Answer' button. When ready, click the 'Start Quiz' button below to begin.
test.passedMessage: You have passed the test with a score of %%score.
test.failedMessage: You have failed the test with a score of %%score.
test.incompleteMessage: You have not completed the test.
